author: freakboy3742
message:
Fixed #15544 -- Corrected a test failure in the generic views tests that depended on primary key allocation. Thanks to ≈Åukasz Rekucki for the report.

git-svn-id: http://code.djangoproject.com/svn/django/trunk@15742 bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37

files.patch:
@@ -203,6 +203,7 @@ def test_update_without_redirect(self):
 
     def test_update_get_object(self):
         a = Author.objects.create(
+            pk=1,
             name='Randall Munroe',
             slug='randall-munroe',
         )
